amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds in contravention of the Department of Energy Organization Act and addresses the need to increase programs that educate minorities in science, technology, engineering and math.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in contravention of the Department of Energy Organization Act (42 U.S.C. 7101 et seq.).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A048) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A048) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
